name: Lost in Truth [EN/RU]
description:
Lost in Truth [EN/RU]
This is a short top-down game. It was splitted for 3 levels and 1 cutscene, so there is no save system, however checkpoint on each level. That would be great if you'll make it to the end.
Controls may feel clanky! And a little tip for 3 lvl...
(Roam and collect enemies in one pack, and then eliminate them)

All events and characters are fictional.
